attributes.action: Legislate to provide water free of charge to all airline passengers when Airside
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: After removal of bottled liquids from Air Passengers at airport security checks, we demand that alternative supplies of water must be provided free of charge by the Airport Authorities, or other competent body, to every air traveller when "Airside", including transfer passengers. Water is a basic human right that is currently denied. Airport retailers currently sell bottled water at inflated prices to this captive audience, directly profiting excessively and unfairly from this Government security requirement.
